summary: A young Hollywood starlet must adjust to a new small town life when she is sent to live with her aunt after a stint in rehab.
cast: JoJo|Ian Nelson|Louis Ferreira|Lynda Boyd|Shenae Grimes-Beech|Jennifer Miller|Melanie Leishman|Leah Renee|Valerie Bertinelli|Dayna Devon|Jonathan Higgins|Jonathan Potts|Zain Meghji|Victoria Snow|Mary Kitchen|Bill Turnbull|Rebecca Amare|Mike 'Nug' Nahrgang|Flossie McKnight|Dan Duran|Kathryn Haggis|Wendii Fulford|Jessica Porter|Carlos Gonzalez-Vio|Marty Moreau|Adrian Griffin|Tannis Burnett|Mark Forward|Lexie Galante|Christopher McGuire|Moses Nyarko|Ben Sainsbury|Matt Steinberg|My Anh Tran
title: True Confessions of a Hollywood Starlet
